Form Note: Record your emotions, target behaviors, and DBT skills used for today
Field Label: In this section, you'll be asked about the DBT skills you used today. If you did not use any of the skills listed, you can tap the "Skip" button.

Form Note: Record your emotions, target behaviors, and DBT skills used for today
Field Label: Please check the **Mindfulness** skills you used today:
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Wise Mind, wisemind.png | 2, Observe: Just notice without reacting, observe.png | 3, Describe: Put words on/label emotion, describe.png | 4, Participate: Enter into the experience, participate.png | 5, Nonjudgmental Stance, nonjudgmental.png | 6, One-mindfully in the moment, moment.png | 7, Effectiveness: Focus on what works, effectiveness.png

Form Note: Record your emotions, target behaviors, and DBT skills used for today
Field Label: Please check the **Interpersonal Effectiveness** skills you used today:
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Objective Effectiveness (DEAR MAN), DEARMAN.png | 2, Relationship Effectiveness (GIVE), GIVE.png | 3, Self-respect Effectivness (FAST), FAST.png | 4, Dialectics, dialectics.png

Form Note: Record your emotions, target behaviors, and DBT skills used for today
Field Label: Please check the **Emotion Regulation** skills you used today:
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Reduced Vulnerability (PLEASE), PLEASE.png | 2, Accumulate Positive Experiences, accumulatePositive.png | 3, Build Mastery, mastery.png | 4, Cope Ahead, copeAhead.png | 5, Check the Facts, checkFacts.png | 6, Problem Solve, problemSolve.png | 7, Opposite Action, oppositeAction.png

Form Note: Record your emotions, target behaviors, and DBT skills used for today
Field Label: Please check the **Distress Tolerance** skills you used today:
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, STOP, STOP.png | 2, Distract (Wise Mind ACCEPTS), distract.png | 3, Self-soothe, selfSoothe.png | 4, TIPP, TIPP.png | 5, IMPROVE the Moment, IMPROVE.png | 6, Pros and Cons, proCons.png | 7, Radical Acceptance, radicalAcceptance.png
